value.string:
'''
 This script get year to date amount for the slice corresponding to slice_path
 of the model.
 '''
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 accounting_module = portal.accounting_module
 
 from_date=DateTime(context.getStartDate().year(), 1, 1)
 to_date=context.getStartDate()
 
 search_params = {
 'portal_type' : 'Pay Sheet Transaction',
 'delivery.start_date' : {'range': "minmax", 'query': (from_date, to_date)},
 'delivery.source_section_uid' : context.getSourceSectionUid(),
 'simulation_state' : ['stopped', 'delivered'],
 }
 
 paysheet_list = [r.getObject() for r in accounting_module.searchFolder(**search_params)]
 
 yearly_slice_amount = 0
 # get the slice value for this paysheet :
 model = context.getSpecialiseValue().getEffectiveModel(\
 start_date=context.getStartDate(),
 stop_date=context.getStopDate())
 slice = model.getCell(slice_path, paysheet=context)
 
 if slice is None:
 return 0.0
 
 plafond_max = slice.getQuantityRangeMax()
 plafond_min = slice.getQuantityRangeMin()
 
 gross_salary = context.PaySheetTransaction_getMovementTotalPriceFromCategory(\
 base_contribution='base_contribution/base_amount/payroll/report/salary/gross',
 contribution_share='contribution_share/employee')
 
 if gross_salary < plafond_max:
 slice_amount = gross_salary - plafond_min
 else:
 slice_amount = plafond_max - plafond_min
 yearly_slice_amount += slice_amount
 
 for paysheet in paysheet_list :
 model = paysheet.getSpecialiseValue().getEffectiveModel(\
 start_date=paysheet.getStartDate(),
 stop_date=paysheet.getStopDate())
 if model is not None:
 slice = model.getCell(slice_path)
 if slice is None:
 return 0.0
 plafond_max = slice.getQuantityRangeMax()
 plafond_min = slice.getQuantityRangeMin()
 gross_salary=paysheet.PaySheetTransaction_getMovementTotalPriceFromCategory(\
 base_contribution='base_contribution/base_amount/payroll/report/salary/gross',
 contribution_share='contribution_share/employee')
 slice_amount = 0
 if gross_salary < plafond_max:
 slice_amount = gross_salary - plafond_min
 else:
 slice_amount = plafond_max - plafond_min
 yearly_slice_amount += slice_amount
 
 return yearly_slice_amount
